meanings.definition: A store where toys are sold.
meanings.sent1: I visited the toyshops to buy a new doll for my sister.
meanings.sent2: Mom took us to the toyshops to pick out a birthday present.
meanings.sent3: The toyshops were filled with colorful toys that made me want to play with them all.
meanings.sent4: Walking into the toyshops felt like entering a magical wonderland of fun and joy.
meanings.sent5: The toyshops were like treasure troves of happiness, with toys waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: The act of shopping for toys.
meanings.sent1: My favorite part of the weekend is going toyshops with my friends.
meanings.sent2: We had a great time toyshops for the upcoming holiday season.
meanings.sent3: After a long week, I decided to treat myself with some toyshops to lift my spirits.
meanings.sent4: Toyshops can be a fun adventure, exploring aisles filled with possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The joy of toyshops is the excitement of finding the perfect toy to bring home.
